full_story: Once upon a sunny day, Fred, Wilma, Barney, and Betty decided to take a fun trip to Rockapulco! “I can’t wait to bowl on the beach!” Fred shouted, his loud voice echoing. Wilma smiled and said, “Let’s explore first, Fred. There’s so much to see!” Pebbles giggled, bouncing up and down, “I want to find seashells!” As they walked along the sandy shore, they met two friendly strangers who offered them shiny gems. “Look at these pretty jewels!” one of them said, winking at Fred. “Let’s take some pictures!” said Barney, his cheerful smile lighting up his face. But soon, the strangers whispered to each other, planning something sneaky! When Fred picked up a shiny jewel, the strangers pretended to gasp, “He’s stealing!” Just then, Dino bounded over, barking happily at Fred. “No, Dino! I didn’t do it!” Fred exclaimed, looking worried. Wilma quickly stepped in, “We believe in Fred! You can’t trick us!” Betty nodded, “Friends don’t frame friends!” Pebbles added, “Yeah! Let’s show them the truth!” With a clever plan, they all worked together, using Barney’s camera to catch the strangers in their sneaky act. “Gotcha!” Fred said proudly as they showed the pictures to Mr. Slate, who was visiting Rockapulco too. “I see! You’re innocent, Fred!” Mr. Slate declared, smiling. The friends cheered, and Pebbles laughed, “Let’s have a beach party instead!” They spent the rest of the day playing games, bowling, and enjoying the sun, knowing that friendship and trust always shine brighter than any jewel!

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Slate: Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

captions_info.caption: They showed the photos to Mr. Slate, who was visiting Rockapulco too. “I see! You’re innocent, Fred!” Mr. Slate declared with a smile.
captions_info.description: Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme. Mr. Slate. Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.A cheerful scene where Fred and Mr. Slate are engaged in a friendly conversation showing photos that highlight a moment of innocence with Mr. Slate expressing understanding and support. A stack of colorful photographs held by Fred showcasing various scenes from their adventures in Rockapulco with vibrant colors and happy moments captured in each image. Fred is holding the photographs out towards Mr. Slate looking eager to share his experiences while Mr. Slate is leaning slightly forward examining the photos with interest and a warm smile. Freds face shows a mix of hope and relief as he is eager for Mr. Slates approval. Mr. Slates expression is one of warmth and reassurance with a broad smile that conveys understanding. Fred is positioned on the left side of the image slightly turned towards Mr. Slate while Mr. Slate is on the right leaning in towards Fred creating a sense of connection between the two. The setting is a sunny outdoor area in Rockapulco with palm trees swaying gently in the breeze colorful beach umbrellas in the distance and a bright blue sky enhancing the cheerful atmosphere of the scene. Medium shot capturing both Fred and Mr. Slate from the waist up allowing for a clear view of their expressions and the photographs being shared.

captions_info.caption: The friends cheered, and Pebbles laughed, “Let’s have a beach party instead!” They spent the rest of the day playing games, bowling, and soaking up the sun.
captions_info.description: Pebbles. Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot. Dino. Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting. Betty. Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive. Barney. Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style. Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.A cheerful beach scene where Pebbles and her friends are excitedly preparing for a beach party filled with laughter and playful activities under the bright sun. Colorful beach toys a beach ball and a picnic blanket spread out with snacks and drinks indicating a festive beach party atmosphere. Pebbles is laughing joyfully suggesting the idea of the beach party. Dino is playfully rolling a beach ball while Betty Barney and Fred are setting up games and arranging the picnic area. Pebbles has a bright infectious smile radiating happiness. Dino looks playful and energetic while Betty Barney and Fred appear enthusiastic and eager sharing smiles and laughter. Pebbles is in the foreground slightly to the left with her arms raised in excitement. Dino is nearby rolling the beach ball towards the center. Betty Barney and Fred are positioned slightly behind Pebbles actively engaging in setting up the picnic area. The scene is set on a sunny beach with golden sand gentle waves lapping at the shore and a clear blue sky. There are palm trees swaying in the breeze and other beachgoers in the distance enjoying the sun. Wide shot capturing the entire beach scene the friends joyful activities and the beautiful beach setting around them.
